pkgmetadata.longdescription: Easy Interface to Effective Concentration Calculations // Because fungicide resistance is an important phenotypic trait for fungi and oomycetes, it is necessary to have a standardized method of statistically analyzing the Effective Concentration (EC) values. This package is designed for those who are not terribly familiar with R to be able to analyze and plot an entire set of isolates using the 'drc' package.
